title: how change your username
body: hello how do you change your sign in user name?

replies.body:
Desonance be quick today!

We don't have any way for players to change their username as it's one of the only bits of data that is kept consistent. I'm not sure if we'll ever have that as an option, but were there any specific reason you wanted this done?

Is it possible to make exceptions? I'm sure for league there is a user id that is kept with the account to keep data consistent (but for all I know I dont know anything about that kind of thing). I'd even happily pay for a new login username because I actually hate looking at it every time I login, I created this account years ago when I was still a teen starting High School and we all know how 'phases' are during that time.
It's not that we won't, we *can't*.

RagingStormX,

Unfortunately you are unable to change your username. If you'd like to change your summoner name that can be done by purchasing a summoner name change from the in-game store for 1,300 RP or 13,900 IP.

Very Respectfully,
Desonance
